page.shortlink: list control data source javascript function
page.description: The 'Javascript Function' option allows you to specify the name of a Javascript function. This function must return an array of JSON objects that contain the data for the List.

discussion.p: When you choose this option, you must specify the name of the Javascript function as well as a list of columns that the List has.
For example, assume that you specify that the List has these columns:

section.description: Your Javascipt function could then be defined as follows:
